input.command:
echo "=== Current .git-ml/ sizes ==="
du -sh .git-ml/*/ 2>/dev/null | sort -h

echo ""
echo "=== What's in tracked/ (SHARED) ==="
ls -lh .git-ml/tracked/

echo ""
echo "=== What's in commits/ (IGNORED - regeneratable) ==="
ls -lh .git-ml/commits/ 2>/dev/null || echo "(empty or doesn't exist)"

echo ""
echo "=== What's in chats/ (IGNORED - YOUR TRAINING DATA!) ==="
ls -lh .git-ml/chats/ 2>/dev/null || echo "(empty - this is the problem!)"
